member.name: T:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings
member.summary: Settings of the V8 JS engine

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.AllowReflection
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to allow the usage of reflection API in the script code
member.remarks: This affects , , and . By default, any attempt to access these members from the script code will throw an exception.

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.AwaitDebuggerAndPauseOnStart
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to the script engine is to wait for a debugger connection and schedule a pause before executing the first line of application script code
member.remarks: This property is ignored if value of the property is false.

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.DebugPort
member.summary: Gets or sets a TCP port on which to listen for a debugger connection

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.DisableDynamicBinding
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to disable dynamic method binding
member.remarks: When this property is set to true, the script engine bypasses the default method binding algorithm and uses reflection-based method binding instead. This approach abandons support for generic type inference and other features, but it avoids engaging the dynamic infrastructure.

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.DisableGlobalMembers
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to disable global members

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.EnableDebugging
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to enable script debugging features (allows a TCP-based debugging)

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.EnableRemoteDebugging
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to enable remote script debugging
member.remarks: This property is ignored if value of the property is false.

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.HeapExpansionMultiplier
member.summary: Gets or sets a heap expansion multiplier
member.remarks: When set to a value greater than 1, this property enables on-demand heap expansion, which automatically increases the maximum heap size by the specified multiplier whenever the script engine is close to exceeding the current limit. Note that a buggy or malicious script can still cause an application to fail by exhausting its address space or total available memory. On-demand heap expansion is recommended for use in conjunction with heap size monitoring (see property to help contain runaway scripts).

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.HeapSizeSampleInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets a minimum time interval between consecutive heap size samples
member.remarks: This property is effective only when heap size monitoring is enabled (see property)

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.MaxArrayBufferAllocation
member.summary: Gets or sets a maximum amount of ArrayBuffer memory the runtime may allocate
member.remarks: This property is specified in bytes. ArrayBuffer memory is allocated outside the runtime's heap and released when its garbage collector reclaims the corresponding JavaScript ArrayBuffer object. Leave this property at its default value to enforce no limit.

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.MaxExecutableSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a maximum size of the executable code heap in mebibytes

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.MaxHeapSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a soft limit for the size of the V8 runtime's heap in bytes

remarks.para: When it is set to the default value, heap size monitoring is disabled, and scripts with memory leaks or excessive memory usage can cause unrecoverable errors and process termination.

A V8 runtime unconditionally terminates the process when it exceeds its resource constraints. This property enables external heap size monitoring that can prevent termination in some scenarios. To be effective, it should be set to a value that is significantly lower than property. Note that enabling heap size monitoring results in slower script execution.
Exceeding this limit causes the V8 runtime to interrupt script execution and throw an exception.
Note that ArrayBuffer memory is allocated outside the runtime's heap and is therefore not tracked by heap size monitoring. See property for additional information.

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.MaxNewSpaceSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a maximum size of the new object heap in mebibytes

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.MaxOldSpaceSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a maximum size of the old object heap in mebibytes

member.name: P:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.MaxStackUsage
member.summary: Gets or sets a maximum amount by which the V8 runtime is permitted to grow the stack during script execution in bytes

remarks.para: When it is set to the default value, no stack usage limit is enforced, and scripts with unchecked recursion or other excessive stack usage can cause unrecoverable errors and process termination.
Note that the V8 runtime does not monitor stack usage while a host call is in progress. Monitoring is resumed when control returns to the runtime.

member.name: M:JavaScriptEngineSwitcher.V8.V8Settings.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs an instance of the V8 settings
